fields.name: cart
fields.description: Returns information about shopping cart

args.name: filters
args.description: Identifies which Category filter inputs to search for and return.

args.name: pageSize
args.description: Specifies the maximum number of results to return at once. This attribute is optional.

args.name: currentPage
args.description: Specifies which page of results to return. The default value is 1.

fields.name: category
fields.description: The category query searches for categories that match the criteria specified in the search and filter attributes.
fields.deprecationReason: Use 'categoryList' query instead of 'category' query

fields.name: categoryList
fields.description: Returns an array of categories based on the specified filters.

args.name: filters
args.description: Identifies which Category filter inputs to search for and return.

fields.name: countries
fields.description: The countries query provides information for all countries.

fields.name: customAttributeMetadata
fields.description: The customAttributeMetadata query returns the attribute type, given an attribute code and entity type

fields.name: customer
fields.description: The customer query returns information about a customer account

fields.name: customerCart
fields.description: Returns information about the customer shopping cart

fields.name: products
fields.description: The products query searches for products that match the criteria specified in the search and filter attributes.

args.name: search
args.description: Performs a full-text search using the specified key words.

args.name: filter
args.description: Identifies which product attributes to search for and return.

args.name: pageSize
args.description: Specifies the maximum number of results to return at once. This attribute is optional.

args.name: currentPage
args.description: Specifies which page of results to return. The default value is 1.

args.name: sort
args.description: Specifies which attributes to sort on, and whether to return the results in ascending or descending order.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: String
types.description:
The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8
character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to
represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: FixedProductTaxDisplaySettings
types.description: This enumeration display settings for the fixed product tax

enumValues.name: INCLUDE_FPT_WITHOUT_DETAILS
enumValues.description: The displayed price includes the FPT amount without displaying the ProductPrice.fixed_product_taxes values. This value corresponds to 'Including FPT only'

enumValues.name: INCLUDE_FPT_WITH_DETAILS
enumValues.description: The displayed price includes the FPT amount while displaying the values of ProductPrice.fixed_product_taxes separately. This value corresponds to 'Including FPT and FPT description'

enumValues.name: EXCLUDE_FPT_AND_INCLUDE_WITH_DETAILS
enumValues.description: The displayed price does not include the FPT amount. The values of ProductPrice.fixed_product_taxes and the price including the FPT are displayed separately. This value corresponds to 'Excluding FPT, Including FPT description and final price'

enumValues.name: EXCLUDE_FPT_WITHOUT_DETAILS
enumValues.description: The displayed price does not include the FPT amount. The values from ProductPrice.fixed_product_taxes are not displayed. This value corresponds to 'Excluding FPT'

enumValues.name: FPT_DISABLED
enumValues.description: The FPT feature is not enabled. You can omit  ProductPrice.fixed_product_taxes from your query

types.name: Int
types.description:
The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric
values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: ID
types.description:
The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to
refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON
response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable.
When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer
(such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

fields.name: applied_coupon
fields.description: An array of coupons that have been applied to the cart
fields.deprecationReason: Use applied_coupons instead

fields.name: available_payment_methods
fields.description: Available payment methods

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for a `Cart` object

types.name: Money
types.description: A Money object defines a monetary value, including a numeric value and a currency code.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: A three-letter currency code, such as USD or EUR

fields.name: value
fields.description: A number expressing a monetary value

types.name: CurrencyEnum
types.description: The list of available currency codes

types.name: Float
types.description:
The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional
values as specified by
[IEEE 754](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

fields.name: code
fields.description: The payment method code

fields.name: title
fields.description: The payment method title.

fields.name: uid
fields.description: The unique ID for a `CartItemInterface` object

types.name: Discount
types.description: Defines an individual discount. A discount can be applied to the cart as a whole or to an item.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The amount of the discount

fields.name: label
fields.description: A description of the discount

types.name: ProductInterface
types.description: The ProductInterface contains attributes that are common to all types of products. Note that descriptions may not be available for custom and EAV attributes.

fields.name: categories
fields.description: The categories assigned to a product.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Timestamp indicating when the product was created.
fields.deprecationReason: The field should not be used on the storefront.

fields.name: crosssell_products
fields.description: Crosssell Products

fields.name: description
fields.description: Detailed information about the product. The value can include simple HTML tags.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID number assigned to the product.
fields.deprecationReason: Use the `uid` field instead.

fields.name: image
fields.description: The relative path to the main image on the product page.

fields.name: media_gallery
fields.description: An array of Media Gallery objects.

fields.name: meta_description
fields.description: A brief overview of the product for search results listings, maximum 255 characters.

fields.name: meta_keyword
fields.description: A comma-separated list of keywords that are visible only to search engines.

fields.name: meta_title
fields.description: A string that is displayed in the title bar and tab of the browser and in search results lists.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The product name. Customers use this name to identify the product.

fields.name: price
fields.description: A ProductPrices object, indicating the price of an item.
fields.deprecationReason: Use price_range for product price information.

fields.name: price_range
fields.description: A PriceRange object, indicating the range of prices for the product

fields.name: rating_summary
fields.description: The average of all the ratings given to the product.

fields.name: related_products
fields.description: Related Products

fields.name: sku
fields.description: A number or code assigned to a product to identify the product, options, price, and manufacturer.

fields.name: small_image
fields.description: The relative path to the small image, which is used on catalog pages.

fields.name: stock_status
fields.description: Stock status of the product

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.description: The relative path to the product's thumbnail image.

fields.name: uid
fields.description: The unique ID for a `ProductInterface` object.

fields.name: updated_at
fields.description: Timestamp indicating when the product was updated.
fields.deprecationReason: The field should not be used on the storefront.

fields.name: upsell_products
fields.description: Upsell Products

fields.name: url_key
fields.description: The part of the URL that identifies the product

fields.name: url_path
fields.deprecationReason: Use product's `canonical_url` or url rewrites instead

types.name: CategoryInterface
types.description: CategoryInterface contains the full set of attributes that can be returned in a category search.

fields.name: breadcrumbs

fields.name: category_url_key

types.name: ProductAttributeSortInput
types.description: ProductAttributeSortInput specifies the attribute to use for sorting search results and indicates whether the results are sorted in ascending or descending order. It's possible to sort products using searchable attributes with enabled 'Use in Filter Options' option

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Attribute label: Product Name

inputFields.name: price
inputFields.description: Attribute label: Price

inputFields.name: relevance
inputFields.description: Sort by the search relevance score (default).

types.name: SortEnum
types.description: This enumeration indicates whether to return results in ascending or descending order

types.name: CategoryProducts
types.description: The category products object returned in the Category query.

fields.name: items
fields.description: An array of products that are assigned to the category.

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: An object that includes the page_info and currentPage values specified in the query.

fields.name: total_count
fields.description: The number of products in the category that are marked as visible. By default, in complex products, parent products are visible, but their child products are not.

types.name: SearchResultPageInfo
types.description: SearchResultPageInfo provides navigation for the query response

fields.name: total_pages
fields.description: Total pages

fields.name: html
fields.description: HTML format

types.name: ProductImage
types.description: Product image information. Contains the image URL and label.

fields.name: disabled
fields.description: Whether the image is hidden from view.

fields.name: label
fields.description: The label of the product image or video.

fields.name: position
fields.description: The media item's position after it has been sorted.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL of the product image or video.

types.name: MediaGalleryInterface
types.description: Contains basic information about a product image or video.

fields.name: disabled
fields.description: Whether the image is hidden from view.

fields.name: label
fields.description: The label of the product image or video.

fields.name: position
fields.description: The media item's position after it has been sorted.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL of the product image or video.

types.name: ProductPrices
types.description: ProductPrices is deprecated, replaced by PriceRange. The ProductPrices object contains the regular price of an item, as well as its minimum and maximum prices. Only composite products, which include bundle, configurable, and grouped products, can contain a minimum and maximum price.

fields.name: regularPrice
fields.description: The base price of a product.
fields.deprecationReason: Use regular_price from PriceRange.minimum_price or PriceRange.maximum_price.

types.name: Price
types.description: Price is deprecated, replaced by ProductPrice. The Price object defines the price of a product as well as any tax-related adjustments.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The price of a product plus a three-letter currency code.
fields.deprecationReason: Price is deprecated, use ProductPrice.

types.name: PriceAdjustmentCodesEnum
types.description: PriceAdjustment.code is deprecated. This enumeration contains values defined in modules other than the Catalog module.

enumValues.name: TAX
enumValues.deprecationReason: PriceAdjustmentCodesEnum is deprecated. Tax is included or excluded in price. Tax is not shown separtely in Catalog

enumValues.name: WEEE
enumValues.deprecationReason: WEEE code is deprecated, use fixed_product_taxes.label

enumValues.name: WEEE_TAX
enumValues.deprecationReason: Use fixed_product_taxes. PriceAdjustmentCodesEnum is deprecated. Tax is included or excluded in price. Tax is not shown separtely in Catalog

types.name: PriceAdjustmentDescriptionEnum
types.description: PriceAdjustmentDescriptionEnum is deprecated. This enumeration states whether a price adjustment is included or excluded.

types.name: PriceRange
types.description: Price range for a product. If the product has a single price, the minimum and maximum price will be the same.

fields.name: maximum_price
fields.description: The highest possible price for the product.

fields.name: minimum_price
fields.description: The lowest possible price for the product.

types.name: ProductPrice
types.description: Represents a product price.

fields.name: discount
fields.description: The price discount. Represents the difference between the regular and final price.

fields.name: final_price
fields.description: The final price of the product after discounts applied.

fields.name: regular_price
fields.description: The regular price of the product.

types.name: ProductDiscount
types.description: A discount applied to a product price.

fields.name: amount_off
fields.description: The actual value of the discount.

fields.name: percent_off
fields.description: The discount expressed a percentage.

types.name: ProductStockStatus
types.description: This enumeration states whether a product stock status is in stock or out of stock

fields.name: discounts
fields.description: An array of applied discounts

fields.name: code
fields.description: The payment method code

fields.name: title
fields.description: The payment method title.

fields.name: method_code
fields.description: Could be null if method is not available

fields.name: method_title
fields.description: Could be null if method is not available

types.name: CategoryFilterInput
types.description: CategoryFilterInput defines the filters to be used in the search. A filter contains at least one attribute, a comparison operator, and the value that is being searched for.

inputFields.name: category_uid
inputFields.description: Filter by the unique category ID for a `CategoryInterface` object.

inputFields.name: ids
inputFields.description: Deprecated: use 'category_uid' to filter uniquely identifiers of categories.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Filter by the display name of the category.

inputFields.name: parent_category_uid
inputFields.description: Filter by the unique parent category ID for a `CategoryInterface` object.

inputFields.name: parent_id
inputFields.description: Filter by the unique parent category ID for a `CategoryInterface` object.

inputFields.name: url_key
inputFields.description: Filter by the part of the URL that identifies the category.

types.name: FilterEqualTypeInput
types.description: Defines a filter that matches the input exactly.

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: A string to filter on

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: An array of values to filter on

types.name: FilterMatchTypeInput
types.description: Defines a filter that performs a fuzzy search.

inputFields.name: match
inputFields.description: One or more words to filter on

types.description: A collection of CategoryTree objects and pagination information.

fields.description: A list of categories that match the filter criteria.

fields.name: total_count
fields.description: The total number of categories that match the criteria.

fields.deprecationReason: Use the `uid` argument instead.

fields.description: The display name of the category.

fields.name: position
fields.description: The position of the category relative to other categories at the same level in tree.

fields.name: product_count
fields.description: The number of products in the category that are marked as visible. By default, in complex products, parent products are visible, but their child products are not.

fields.name: products
fields.description: The list of products assigned to the category.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION

types.name: SimpleProduct
types.description: A simple product is tangible and is usually sold in single units or in fixed quantities

types.name: BundleItem
types.description: BundleItem defines an individual item in a bundle product.

fields.name: option_id
fields.description: An ID assigned to each type of item in a bundle product.
fields.deprecationReason: Use `uid` instead

fields.name: options
fields.description: An array of additional options for this bundle item.

fields.name: position
fields.description: he relative position of this item compared to the other bundle items.

fields.name: required
fields.description: Indicates whether the item must be included in the bundle.

fields.name: sku
fields.description: The SKU of the bundle product.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The display name of the item.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The input type that the customer uses to select the item. Examples include radio button and checkbox.

types.name: BundleItemOption
types.description: BundleItemOption defines characteristics and options for a specific bundle item.

fields.name: can_change_quantity
fields.description: Indicates whether the customer can change the number of items for this option.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID assigned to the bundled item option.
fields.deprecationReason: Use `uid` instead

fields.name: is_default
fields.description: Indicates whether this option is the default option.

fields.name: label
fields.description: The text that identifies the bundled item option.

fields.name: position
fields.description: When a bundle item contains multiple options, the relative position of this option compared to the other options.

fields.name: price
fields.description: The price of the selected option.

fields.name: price_type
fields.description: One of FIXED, PERCENT, or DYNAMIC.

fields.name: product
fields.description: Contains details about this product option.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: Indicates the quantity of this specific bundle item.

fields.name: value_index

types.name: GiftCardTypeEnum
types.description: This enumeration defines the types of gift cards

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted in [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/).
